description:
Ichika appearred for the first time in episode 7. She`s shown to have some sort of connection with Jen and the Dogisians. Furthermore she can use power cards to improve abilities, whether they are hers or of someone else. After the credits on episode 12 of the anime adaption, it is revealed that she is an "immortal" Catian and discusses other lifeforms over the phone to an unidentified male.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ichika
